Fictional characters you'd have sex with

Angel (David Boreanaz). He could bite me anytime. :biggrin1:

The second set of Agents from THE MATRIX RELOADED. Mainly the ones played by Matt McColm and David Kilde. Those guys were hot. David Bernhardt was sexy as one of the agents but I am ambivalent about having sex with that guy for now.

One of the guys (the actual stuntperson: KEIR BECK) who fought in the HEL NIGHT CLUB coat check scene in THE MATRIX REVOLUTIONS. That guy was hot.

Connor from the HIGHLANDER TV series played by Adrian Paul. He was really hot.

The Winchester Brothers and the dad from the TV series SUPERNATURAL. Those guys are totally hot.
